channel.title: Talker10.com - An audible social hub
channel.description:
Hello, I am really glad to let you know about Talker10.com- an audible social hub. Although it's currently in dev stage, it gets the features of talking and sharing your voice with others. The concept is to find out a new experience through natural imotional expression.
So, please check that out, and feel free to let me know your feedback, what else you would have wanted there.... Thank you a lot!
Note: Please use Chrome or FF browser for for better return.

item.title: Talker10.com - An audible social hub
item.dc:creator: shantnu
item.description:
I have no idea what it does, why I should use it, or even why I should trust my microphone to some web service.

Read full topic
